util.config

Class SingleStringItemConfigProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.config.SingleItemConfigProvider<java.lang.String>
      • util.config.SingleStringItemConfigProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.Optional<java.lang.String>>, ConfigProvider<java.lang.String>

    public class SingleStringItemConfigProvider
extends SingleItemConfigProvider<java.lang.String>
    Specializes SingleItemConfigProvider to string items so that if the looked up string value is null or empty, the returned stream (or optional) will be empty.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SingleStringItemConfigProvider(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> lookup)
      Creates a new instance to read a configuration item given a supplier.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Uses the underlying supplier to look up the configuration item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleStringItemConfigProvider

        public SingleStringItemConfigProvider(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> lookup)
        Creates a new instance to read a configuration item given a supplier.
        Parameters:
        lookup - supplies the configuration item, can return null or empty if the item is not found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> get()
        Uses the underlying supplier to look up the configuration item. If the supplier returns null (e.g. item not found) or empty, then the returned optional will be empty; otherwise it will contain whichever object the supplier returned.
        Specified by:
        get in interface java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.Optional<java.lang.String>>
        Overrides:
        get in class SingleItemConfigProvider<java.lang.String>
